---
labels: ['module', 'tester', 'vitest']
description: 'A Vitest tester'
---

A Vitest tester for Bit. 

Use this to test your components using the [Vitest](https://vitest.dev/) in your dev environment:

```ts
import { ReactEnv } from '@bitdev/react.react-env';
import { VitestTester } from '@teambit/vite.vitest-tester';

class MyEnv extends ReactEnv {
  tester() {
    return (
      VitestTester.from({
        config: require.resolve('./config/vitest.config.js')
      });
    );
  }
}
```

If you don't have a Bit dev environment, see a guide for [creating your dev environment](https://bit.dev/docs/getting-started/composing/dev-environments).

## Add to your build pipeline

Use the Mocha task to test your components during build:

```ts
import { ReactEnv } from '@bitdev/react.react-env';
import { VitestTask } from '@teambit/vite.vitest-tester';
import { Pipeline } from '@teambit/builder';

class MyEnv extends ReactEnv {
  build() {
    return Pipeline.from([
      // your other tasks...
      VitestTask.from({
        config: require.resolve('./config/vitest.config.js'),
      }),
    ]);
  }
}
```
